ctx: Nova covid pravila v trgovinah; brez karantene ob tveganem stiku le cepljeni s poživitvenim odmerkom
content:

ctx: Nova covid pravila v trgovinah; brez karantene ob tveganem stiku le cepljeni s poživitvenim odmerkom
content:
Zadnja sprememba: ogo 22.12.2021 21:31
Kaj pa že dvakrat cepljeni in tudi preboleli?

Zblojenost, da se za vsako ceno poriva cepiva, tudi ko ni treba.
Ker je počasi jasno, da niso več efektivna. Naročili so jih pa še
za 17 let cepljenj. Cepiv za original vuhanski sev, ki je izumrl.
author: ogo

ctx: Nova covid pravila v trgovinah; brez karantene ob tveganem stiku le cepljeni s poživitvenim odmerkom
content:
Kaj pa jaz vem. Gledam to revščino iz opozicije in se sprašujem in
se sprašujem...
Zmaga Kula ni samoumevna, bi jaz rekel.
author: XZDRA4

ctx: Nova covid pravila v trgovinah; brez karantene ob tveganem stiku le cepljeni s poživitvenim odmerkom
content:
Na Quori je bilo vprašanje in odgovor.

Q: How effective are vaccine mandates?
A: Some 15 years ago (around the mid-2000’s) Italy decided to stop
mandating vaccines, as the vast majority of children received them.
The overall idea was that the high uptake meant that people had
understood the value of the vaccines to prevent diseases. In the
short matter of 5 years the vaccine uptake fell to the point that
measles outbreaks started to occur and children died or were
disabled by the disease. Vaccine mandates were reintroduced In 2018
and now the vaccine uptake is once again at a safe level, more or
less at the same levels as 15 years ago before the mandate was
cancelled.
author: aimon
